DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To assess functional anatomical outcome primary vitrectomy without scleral buckle rhegmatogenous retinal detachment ( RRD ) highly myopic eye axial length 30 mm . Methods Design : Retrospective single center series . Setting : University Hospital . Patients : High myopic patient treat primary vitrectomy without scleral buckle rhegmatogenous retinal detachment . Outcome measure : Anatomical success rate complete reattachment retina without silicone oil tamponade postoperative best-corrected visual acuity ( BCVA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Primary Vitrectomy Treatment Retinal Detachment Highly Myopic
DOC.criteria: retinal detachment secondary peripheral break ( retinal tear , atrophic retinal hole ) secondary posterior break ( MH , PVT ) . retinal detachment secondary severe eye injury , diabetic retinopathy , retinopathy prematurity , uveitis .
